nama yojana sabhapathi - lakshmi wiktoriya (janasathu sewa), tiraksi nanayakkara (rajya sewa), niyojya sabhapathi - yasmin dharmarathna (kolambaa), chandani ediriwira (kaluthara) upa sabhapathi (6) sanjiwani wanasinha (welenda sewa), lalitha da silwa (pasal), padma baddewela (kolambaa), mangalika wikramathilaka (mathara), asoka manchanayaka (gampaha), muthulakshami hagoda (galla), aasha siriwardhana (basnahira), dewi aponsu (krida bhumi), ee.

thrasthawadaya parajaya kara 2009 wasare ratata dina dun nidahasa rakaganime wagakima me rate siyaludena sathu bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha prakasha kaleya.rata dekada kirima nathara kara samakenakutama nidahase jiwath wime ayithiya rakadimata hakiyawa labunu bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya siyaludena ekwa ema ayithiya rakagatha yuthu bawath awadharanaya kaleya.janadhipathiwaraya me adahas pala kale rathnapura niwithigala dala maha widyalaye idikarana lada fransis dala anusmarana shrawanagaraya wiwrutha kirime awasthawata pereda (16) ekwemini.malidiwayine shri lanka maha komasaris diksan dala mahathage paudgalika dhana parithyagayen widyalayata labadena lada mema shrawanagaraya siyalu pahasukamwalin samanwitha angasampurna shrawanagarayaki.shrawanagaraya sisu ayithiyata pawarimata pamini janadhipathiwaraya widyalaye daruwan wisin mahath harasarin yuthuwa piliganu labini.samaru palakaya nirawaranaya kara shrawanagaraya sisu ayithiyata pawaru janadhipathithuma ehi nirikshana charikawaka da niratha wiya.
